Articles.Content:
Greetings!

This baby took a night to create and another night to produce its debut video. I created this vehicle and tried to mimic its performance for fun and hilarity. I find it very fun to drive...as long as you're not trying to really get anywhere fast.

I wanted to showcase...THE BUS!

I created this craft for use in an upcoming roleplay series I will be making. It holds 24 Kerbals and has been made intentionally clunky and ungainly. It's tons of fun...either due to explosions, or just the skill to actually use this thing.

[Controls]

U - Lights [Default]

G - Ladders

R - Antenna [RCS Default]

T - ASAS [Default, for rear stability >_>]

[Driving Tips]

-Do not taunt THE BUS.

-Do not try a full-on brake at more than 6.5 m/s

-Do not try a hard turn at more than 7.5 m/s (and be careful at that too)

-Be patient

-Quicksave often...

-Give yourself plenty of room and time to brake from high speeds (don't forget to *tap* the brakes...)

-Do not forget...it's THE BUS (and it drives like one)

Now...it is time to drive THE BUS...IF YOU DARE!
